sentences.cn: 一个观察敏锐的年轻人

sentences.en: Compassionate and perceptive, Crabs do best in nurturing professions.
sentences.cn: 巨蟹:理解力强 、 富于同情心的蟹子能做好一切和养育相关的工作.
加拉赫的眼睛现在亮得多了.

sentences.en: He is a truly perceptive critic.
sentences.cn: 他确是一位很有眼力的批评家.

sentences.en: He is very perceptive and nothing can be hidden from him.
sentences.cn: 他耳聪目明,什么事都很难瞒住他.

sentences.en: He was one of the most perceptive U.S. political commentators.
sentences.cn: 他曾是美国最具洞察力的政治评论员之一。

sentences.en: His comment was trenchant and perceptive.
sentences.cn: 他的评论既一针见血又鞭辟入里。

sentences.en: I do not know whether the perceptive Peter Lee believed me.
sentences.cn: 不知道善于观察的李彼得是否相信了我.

sentences.en: It's no good trying to pull the wool over Harlod's eyes, he's far too perceptive.
sentences.cn: 无法蒙骗哈罗德, 他洞察力太强了.

sentences.en: It's no good trying to pull the wool over Harlod's eyes; he's far too perceptive.
sentences.cn: 无法蒙骗哈罗德，他洞察力太强了。

sentences.en: It'studies performance intuition and performance perceptive skills through performance fulfillment.
sentences.cn: 通过性能实践,研究了系统的性能直觉、性能感知技能.

sentences.en: Perceptive software observes what users are doing and uses those observations to offer relevant information.
sentences.cn: 有知觉的软件观察用户在做什么,然后利用那些模式来提供相关的信息.

sentences.en: She claims that it makes mums - to - be more perceptive, efficient and resilient.
sentences.cn: 她说,怀孕让准妈妈们表现出更出色的理解力, 她们会比以前更能干、更灵活.

sentences.en: Telepathy can be either projective or perceptive, we either send or receive.
sentences.cn: 心灵感应可以投射或感知, 也就是说我们或者发送或者接收它.

sentences.en: They are, however, unerringly perceptive of trusting relationships with professionals.
sentences.cn: 但他们却是, 准确无误地知觉与专业人士的信任关系.

sentences.en: What you said about my getting hung up on trivialities is especially perceptive.
sentences.cn: 你说我在小节上看不开,这话尤其深刻.

sentences.en: You’re right. That’s very perceptive of you.

words.tran_cn: 可察觉的；可感知的；看得见的
知觉的；感知的；有知觉的
目光敏锐的；有洞察力的
显然地；可感觉得出地；看得出地
知觉地；有洞察力地；敏锐地
感觉力；理解力；可察觉性
知觉；[生理] 感觉；看法；洞察力；获取
感知；认为（perceive的过去分词）；领会
感知的，知觉的；有知觉力的

trans.tran_cn: 有知觉力的，感知的，有理解力的
trans.tran_en: If you describe a person or their remarks or thoughts as perceptive, you think that they are good at noticing or realizing things, especially things that are not obvious
